Detailed Description

Definition at line 37 of file PowerupBigHand.h.

Member Function Documentation

void PowerupBigHand::StopEffect ( u8  player  )  [protected, virtual]

Allow more than one PowerupBigHand to be in effect at the same time.

This function assumes this powerup has already been removed from the powerup effect queue. If another PowerupBigHand is in the queue then allow that one to stop the effect.

Implements Powerup.
